description: Billy mane of long coal black hair and deep smoldering eyes sets the perfect stage for the always simmering sexuality that seems to just ooze out of him.He is the very seductive mix of part roCker, part professional and seeing the bulge in just from the office khakis let us know we were in for treat.Naturally smooth, with spider web tattoo strategically placed so it just peeks out of the top of the waistband, when he got down to his black briefs, that hose inside formed a thick lump that made the fabric dance.  The expression in his eyes as he rubbed that mound, finally releasing a thick, seven inch pole with a helmet head already leaking juice. He didn't just casually rub away, but worked that pole slow, fast, on the top, on the bottom, building up to an explosion of of the white stuff that dripped down his hand!
title: Billy The Movie, Scene #01
